location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 95 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'b'; '16'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:Distant view of Steamer Point, Aden, Steamer, looking almost due west from on board ship. Military and other colonial buildings line the shore at centre. The high rocky range that divides Steamer Point from Crater is visible in the background at centre right.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘Aden’Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘b’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘16’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘Steamer Point’,‘(Dec. 1916)’
